title: How do I enable a numerical password to unlock the screen?
answer:
1. Go to Settings > Screen lock & passwords > Password > PIN. 

 1. Enter a numerical password into the dialog box. 

 1. Enter the password again and touch the confirm button. 

 When you press the power button or turn on your phone, after swiping lift or right, the numerical password screen will be displayed. After you enter the password, the screen will automatically unlock.
